languages.text: "Мне тяжело слышать эти слова. Но от того они не становятся неверными. Не стоит арбитру и Вольному Торговцу замутнять свои отношения симпатией".
languages.translation_comment:
Если стартован ArbitesRomance
Соломон гордо уходит, первый

traits.locale_text: {n}На мгновение сверкнув гневом, глаза Соломона вновь наливаются привычным стальным равнодушием.{/n} "В таком случае разрешите откланяться, Вольный Торговец".

languages.translation_comment:
Если стартован ArbitesRomance
Соломон гордо уходит, первый

languages.text: "It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."
languages.original_text: "Мне тяжело слышать эти слова. Но от того они не становятся неверными. Не стоит арбитру и Вольному Торговцу замутнять свои отношения симпатией".

traits.locale_text: "It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."
"It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."
"It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."
"It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."
"It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."

languages.text: "Es ist schwer für mich, das zu hören. Aber deshalb sind die Worte nicht falsch. Ein Arbitrator und {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} sollten Privates nicht mit Beruflichem vermischen."
languages.original_text: "It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schwer für mich, das zu hören. Aber deshalb sind die Worte nicht falsch. Ein Arbitrator und {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} sollten Privates nicht mit Beruflichem vermischen."

languages.text: « Aussi douloureux qu'il me soit d'entendre ces mots, ça ne les rend pas faux pour autant. Il serait inconvenant pour un arbitrator et {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} de laisser les sentiments embrouiller leur relation professionnelle. »
languages.original_text: "It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."

traits.locale_text: « Aussi douloureux qu'il me soit d'entendre ces mots, ça ne les rend pas faux pour autant. Il serait inconvenant pour un arbitrator et {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} de laisser les sentiments embrouiller leur relation professionnelle. »

languages.text: 「その言葉を聞くのは苦しいです…ですが、間違っているわけではありません。アービトレイターとローグトレーダーは、感情で仕事の関係を曇らせるべきではありませんから」
languages.original_text: "It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."

traits.locale_text: 「その言葉を聞くのは苦しいです…ですが、間違っているわけではありません。アービトレイターとローグトレーダーは、感情で仕事の関係を曇らせるべきではありませんから」

languages.text: «Me resulta duro escuchar esas palabras, pero eso no hace que sean incorrectas. Un Arbitrator y un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no pueden permitir que lo personal enturbie su relación laboral».
languages.original_text: "It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."

traits.locale_text: «Me resulta duro escuchar esas palabras, pero eso no hace que sean incorrectas. Un Arbitrator y un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no pueden permitir que lo personal enturbie su relación laboral».

languages.text: “对我而言，这些话很难接受，但这并不意味你的话是错的。行商浪人与法务官应当保持明确的工作关系，不该被个人感情干扰。”
languages.original_text: "It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."

traits.locale_text: “对我而言，这些话很难接受，但这并不意味你的话是错的。行商浪人与法务官应当保持明确的工作关系，不该被个人感情干扰。”

languages.text: "Bu sözleri duymak benim için zor. Gelgelelim bu onları yanlış yapmaz. Bir Yargıcı ile Hür Tacir, çalışma ilişkilerine duygularını katmamalıdır."
languages.original_text: "It's hard for me to hear these words. But that does not make them wrong. An Arbitrator and a Rogue Trader should not muddy their working relationship with feelings."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sözleri duymak benim için zor. Gelgelelim bu onları yanlış yapmaz. Bir Yargıcı ile Hür Tacir, çalışma ilişkilerine duygularını katmamalıdır."
